data: The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" covers authentication using OAuth2 with JWT tokens.
The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" lists the API endpoints GET /users, POST /orders, and PUT /products/{id}.
The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" specifies error handling via standard HTTP status codes with JSON error objects.
The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" emphasizes using OAuth2 JWT for secure API communication.
The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" highlights CRUD endpoints as key components of the API design.
The note "API Version 2.0 Specification" documents the decision to standardize error responses for consistency.
